synopsis.text: Buta, a formidable samurai pig, finds himself on a perilous journey to uncover a hidden treasure, hired by the notorious Tufugu Pirates. Aboard their ship, he stumbles upon Kitsune, a young fox who has been kidnapped from his affluent family. The pirates stole an enigmatic map that has been passed down through Kitsune's family for generations, and now the young fox is caught up in their schemes. After some initial misunderstandings, Buta and Kitsune form an unlikely alliance, driven by the promise of wealth and the desire to return the map to its rightful owners. Together, they embark on a thrilling adventure filled with danger and intrigue, aiming to outwit the pirates and restore Kitsune's family heirloom.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
